jobs.title: Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
Hiring:
Business Development Executive - We are looking for driven and motivated graduates + non-graduates with work experience to join our Health Tech company based in Old Street. You'll need to be enthusiastic and bright with a strong desire to succeed in a fast-growing Startup. 

Salary:  
Up to £20,000 basic salary with £25,000 OTE. 

About LiveSmart:  
LiveSmart is on a mission to help businesses and individuals become healthier. We combine blood analysis, technology, and health coaching to create a next generation health improvement platform. We’ve just closed a large funding round and as a result we are going through a period of rapid growth.  

The Role: 
-Generating prospective customer interest 
-Uncovering fresh opportunities 
-Engaging key decision makers by LinkedIn and email 
-Coordinating meetings 
-Learning from and shadowing colleagues 
-Developing the knowledge, skill and tools needed for success 

Ideal Candidate: 
-Highly ambitious and motivated team player 
-Self-starting hard worker 
-Excellent Lead Generation 
-Proactive in building and following up on relationships 
-Ideally educated to degree level 
-Non-graduate candidates with relevant sales experience are welcome 
-Science or health related degrees a plus but not essential 

Please contact colin@getlivesmart.com
